metadata.feature_description: Configure activity stream module settings and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed page and enter Edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode is enabled and module action menus are visible
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled successfully with Publish/Discard buttons visible

steps.action: Hover over Activity Stream module and click Admin > Settings
steps.actual: Module Settings dialog opened with tabs for Module Settings, Permissions, Page Settings, and Activity Stream

steps.expected: Activity Stream specific settings are displayed
steps.actual: Activity Stream tab displayed with all expected settings: Enable Editor, File Attachments, Photo Attachments, Max Files, View Filters, Grouping, Page Size, Max Characters, and Activity Types

steps.action: Click Update button to save settings
Reopen module settings to verify persistence
steps.actual: File Attachments checkbox confirmed unchecked after page reload, indicating successful persistence

steps.action: Change 'Maximum Characters per message' dropdown from 250 to 500

steps.actual: Maximum Characters confirmed as 500 after page reload, indicating successful persistence

steps.action: Uncheck 'Badge' activity type from Activity Types list
steps.actual: Badge checkbox successfully unchecked while other activity types remain checked

steps.expected: Badge activity type remains unchecked after reload
steps.actual: Badge checkbox confirmed unchecked after page reload, indicating successful persistence of activity filter configuration

steps.action: Uncheck 'Enable Photo Attachments' checkbox and check 'Enable File Attachments'
steps.expected: Photo Attachments unchecked, File Attachments checked
steps.actual: Both settings changed successfully in the UI

steps.action: Click Update button to save settings
steps.actual: Server error occurred: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' Page displayed 'A critical error has occurred.'

issues: Saving module settings after changing Photo Attachments and File Attachments settings results in server error: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' This appears to be a bug in the UpdateSettings method.

steps.action: After initial save, navigate away from page and return to module settings
steps.actual: All settings persisted correctly: File Attachments unchecked, Maximum Characters set to 500, Badge activity type unchecked

observations: Code suggests emoji panel setting exists but no explicit UI setting was found for 'Enable/disable emoji panel' - the emoji functionality appears to be always enabled through the activity stream editor
Settings inheritance was not testable as there is no visible UI for configuring settings inheritance between parent/child modules

A server error (NullReferenceException) occurred when attempting to save settings after toggling both Photo and File Attachments - this may indicate a bug in the UpdateSettings method when certain combinations of settings are changed
